name: HappyCool
profile:
Hello!! Welcome to HappyCool! We love TV shows and we love to talk about them! We review TV shows, share recommendations, do breakdowns, play TV themed games and lots more! 

Currently, we review and talk about shows like Game of Thrones, The Flash, The 100, Outlander, Teen Wolf, Agents of SHIELD, Daredevil and more. 

Oh and we should probably introduce ourselves. We're Americ and Sandrine. Nice to meet you!

Let us know if there is anything you'd like to hear us talk about and it might make it in one of our videos. :)

Thanks for watching!!

Contact us at: happycoolofficial@gmail.com
